Hi there, my first review for a gane. I hope it helps.

Creed is in my eyes a very good box game using the Rocky licence to create immersive box fights. You could play a story, campaign where you start as a nobody boxer (son of Apollo Creed) and fight to the top. Its fun, challenging and you need to train before fights to get stamina (think about doing small trainings with the rocky training sountrack in a small time limit) so i garant you will sweat a lot. Sadly most story only comes about radio voices so its not very interesting. Beside that you could do your own fights with the legendary boxers from the movies.

And you have MULTIPLAYER!

Finally lets talk about Stamina. The Game is all about punch other people and get punched. The weight of the gloves and the feeling of get punched in the face is nothing you can feel in VR. This game try to simulate that in a more gamey way. You controll a ghost version of yourself (i called it the mind) and you could see your ghost hands moving around exact where you move the real arms. And there is the boxer which try to follow your movements. I say try cause the boxer get exhaustet when moving to fast and cant follow fast enough. When getting heavily punched you temporary lose control of the body and if you go down your mind flew out of the ring and you need to run back into your body before you loose.

Its an very interesting way to put weight in the game. You start to worry about your body and you fight more strategic to reduce incoming damage and keep your stamina healthy. I personally find that much more entertaining than the your-own-stamina-counts variant of thrill of a fight.

The only negative thing is the movement system. You cant use the sticks to move forward or strafe. Moving with your hands feels more like some sort of ape and not human like.

But in the end that doesnt matter. When you play Rocky and finally beat rhat one guy in the campaign and he goes down and the rocky-victory-melody starts to play... Oh i love that. Maybe its not a perfect box simulation. But it is a very fun and rewarding BOX GAME.
